Create maps for each data type

D-WQ/Phyto
```{r}
df_wq_stations <- get_edi_file(458, glue::glue('EMP_DWQ_Stations_1975-{report_year}'))[[1]]

df_wq_stations <- df_wq_stations %>%
  dplyr::filter(Status == 'Active' & !is.na(StationID))

df_wq_stations <- assign_regions(df_wq_stations)
df_wq_stations$Region <- factor(df_wq_stations$Region, levels = c('San Pablo Bay','Suisun & Grizzly Bays','Confluence','Northern Interior Delta','Central Delta','Southern Interior Delta'))
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(mapview)

bbox <- list(
  left = -122.2,
  bot = 37.6,
  right = -121.9,
  top = 38.39)

beatCol <- colorFactor(palette = 'Set2', df_wq_stations$Region)

m <- leaflet(df_wq_stations) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery) %>%
  fitBounds(bbox$left, bbox$bot, bbox$right, bbox$top) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(lng = ~Longitude, lat = ~Latitude, color = ~beatCol(Region),
                   fillOpacity = 0.8, opacity = 1, label = df_wq_stations$Station) %>%
  addLegend('bottomright', pal = beatCol, values = df_wq_stations$Region,
          title = 'Regions',
          opacity = 1)
m
# mapshot(m, file = 'test.png')
```
